name: Swedish Generosity
title: Significant Swedish Aid
description: In 2015, Saint Lucia received a notable amount of $9,999.99 from Sweden in net bilateral aid flows, highlighting the strong international support and partnership between the two nations.

name: Transparent Governance
title: Strong Public Sector Integrity
description: In 2023, Saint Lucia achieved a CPIA transparency, accountability, and corruption rating of 4.5, indicating a commendable level of integrity and transparency in its public sector operations.
